name: Police Emergency
description: General police assistance for crimes, theft, immediate danger, and law enforcement.
keywords: crime, theft, robbery, danger, police, cop, help, attack, violence

name: Women Helpline
description: Dedicated support for women facing harassment, domestic violence, or abuse.
keywords: women, harassment, abuse, domestic violence, rape, stalking, safety, girl

name: Mental Health Support
description: Counseling and support for depression, anxiety, suicidal thoughts, and mental distress.
keywords: depression, suicide, sad, anxiety, mental, stress, kill myself, lonely, help

name: Childline
description: Emergency helpline for children in distress, lost children, or child abuse cases.
keywords: child, kid, abuse, lost, labour, trafficking, minor, baby

name: Elder Line
description: Assistance for senior citizens facing abuse, neglect, or health issues.
keywords: senior, old, elderly, grandpa, grandma, abuse, neglect, help

name: Cyber Crime Helpline
description: Report online fraud, hacking, cyber bullying, and digital crimes.
keywords: cyber, hack, fraud, scam, online, bank, money, internet, computer

name: Ambulance Service
description: Emergency medical transportation and ambulance services.
keywords: medical, ambulance, hurt, injury, blood, accident, heart attack, stroke, sick

name: Fire Emergency
description: Fire brigade and rescue services for fire emergencies.
keywords: fire, burn, smoke, flame, rescue, trapped
